dateCellRender.description: Customize the display of the date cell by setting a scoped slot, the returned content will be appended to the cell

dateFullCellRender.description: Customize the display of the date cell by setting a scoped slot, the returned content will override the cell

disabledDate.description: Function that specifies the dates that cannot be selected

mode.description: The display mode of the calendar

monthCellRender.description: Customize the display of the month cell by setting a scoped slot, the returned content will be appended to the cell

monthFullCellRender.description: Customize the display of the month cell by setting a scoped slot, the returned content will override the cell
